DOC.brief_summary: This open label , multicenter , 30 day study design mimic OTC like environment subject use product making purchase decision ibuprofen 400 mg caplets base read Drug Facts Label ( DFL ) information package .
DOC.criteria: Male female least 18 year age ( 19 year age Alabama ) Subject report take overthecounter ( OTC ) analgesic pain fever relief Current governmentissued identification ( ID ) Pregnant breastfeeding female
